paramInformation.label: Temperature and Light Sensor Sensing Frequency

metadata.inclusion: Press and release the button on the sensor. The blue LED will activate for 3 seconds to confirm inclusion.
metadata.exclusion: Press and release the button on the sensor. The LED will blink for 3 seconds at a time.
metadata.reset:
1. Press the button 10 times within 6 seconds (interval between presses cannot be longer than 1 second).
2. The blue LED will blink for 3 seconds.
